seo.title: Privacy — HALO — Reliable Elder Care
seo.description: Plain-language privacy posture. Avoid absolutes unless enforceable.

body_blocks.title: Privacy, plainly
body_blocks.body: We aim to keep the HALO experience focused on safety and usability. Privacy commitments published here must be specific, enforceable, and consistent with our policies and agreements.

body_blocks.title: What this page is not
body_blocks.body: This page is not a promise of absolutes unless explicitly stated in enforceable terms. We avoid broad claims that cannot be verified or controlled.

body_blocks.title: Your choices
body_blocks.body: You choose who gets notified and how. Verification is documented through Test & Verified.
